mapper.sql: id ,menu_name,parent_id, order_num,path,component, is_frame,menu_type,visible, status,perms,icon, create_by,create_time,update_by, update_time,remark,del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sys_menu.perms FROM sys_user_role LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role_menu.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu ON sys_menu.id = sys_role_menu.menu_id WHERE sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId} AND sys_menu.menu_type IN ('C', 'F') AND sys_menu.`status` = 0 AND sys_menu.del_flag = 0

SELECT DISTINCT sys_menu.id, sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.menu_name, sys_menu.path, sys_menu.component, sys_menu.visible, sys_menu.`status`, IFNULL(sys_menu.perms, '') AS perms, sys_menu.is_frame, sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.icon, sys_menu.order_num, sys_menu.create_time FROM sys_menu WHERE sys_menu.menu_type IN ('M', 'C') AND sys_menu.`status` = 0 AND sys_menu.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT sys_menu.id, sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.menu_name, sys_menu.path, sys_menu.component, sys_menu.visible, sys_menu.`status`, IFNULL(sys_menu.perms, '') AS perms, sys_menu.is_frame, sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.icon, sys_menu.order_num, sys_menu.create_time FROM sys_user_role LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role_menu.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu ON sys_menu.id = sys_role_menu.menu_id WHERE sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId} AND sys_menu.menu_type IN ('M', 'C') AND sys_menu.`status` = 0 AND sys_menu.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.order_num
select m.id from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId}
